attributes.action: Close schools and cancel GCSEs / A-levels due to the new mutations of COVID-19.
attributes.additional_details: Due to the new mutations of COVID, students may have to miss out even more of their learning time at school. 3 weeks of extra preparations will not make up for 7 months (or even more for areas hit with COVID badly) of learning time that was missed.
attributes.background: Close down schools to regulate the acceleration of COVID's new mutations spreading, and issue grades according to predicted grades and teacher's assessments.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066
